text: My mom sent me a Douyin wedding invitation screenshot of my first crush from elementary school celebrating his wedding during this New Year. I could barely recognize who it was without seeing the name. Getting married - everyone's starting to get married. This path that was once considered the most natural course of life has now become something I completely exclude from my life plans. Looking back, I've really come a long way, but this is insignificant. I will go much further on my own path. The work is the first line of my obituary. The work is the first line of my obituary.

quoted_message.text:
>The work is the first line of my obituary.

>我的事业会是我讣闻的开头。
